mapper.insert: insert into shop_cart (cartId, Id, productId, cartSize, quantity) values (cart_no_seq.nextval, #{Id}, #{productId}, #{cartSize}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM shop_cart WHERE Id = #{loggedInUserId} AND productId = #{productId}
mapper.update: update Products set stock = stock - #{quantity} where productId = #{productId}
